- Location: Kitchen sink cabinet; under-sink drain assembly.  
- Materials: White PVC drain piping, P-trap with slip-joint nuts, trap arm to wall.  
- Condition: No active leaks visible in photo; joints appear intact.  
- Observations: Light brown staining at one slip-joint suggesting past minor seepage or mineral buildup.  
- Recommendation: Verify with a live water test and reseal/tighten slip joints if staining recurs; keep area free of clutter for access and maintenance.
